label: 廊御方
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Also called Shimotsuke. Daughter of dengaku performer Sonokoma; adopted by Michimasa. As a minor palace attendant, favored by Retired Emperor Kameyama; became mother of Prince Kanenaga. [下野,　田楽, 　道正,　亀山, 兼良親王]
